      public boolean setAppointmentRecordStatus(String AppointmentRecordID, String status)
      Updates the status of a specific appointment record.
      Parameters:
      AppointmentRecordID - the ID of the appointment record
      status - the new status to set
      Returns:
      true if the status update was successful, false otherwise

    • generateAppointmentOutcomeRecord

      public AppointmentOutcomeRecord generateAppointmentOutcomeRecord(MedicalRecord medicalRecord, String diagnosisID, String typeOfService, String consultationNotes)
      Generates an appointment outcome record for a specific medical record and diagnosis. Populates the outcome record with details such as patient ID, doctor ID, type of service, and consultation notes, and marks the outcome status as incomplete.
      Parameters:
      medicalRecord - the medical record associated with the appointment
      diagnosisID - the ID of the diagnosis for the appointment outcome
      typeOfService - the type of service provided during the appointment
      consultationNotes - notes taken by the doctor during the consultation
      Returns:
      the created AppointmentOutcomeRecord object

    • getMedicalRecordID

      public static String getMedicalRecordID(String doctorId, String patientId)
      Retrieves the medical record ID for a given doctor and patient.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor
      patientId - the ID of the patient
      Returns:
      the ID of the matching medical record, or null if no record is found

    • retrieveMedicalRecordID

      public String retrieveMedicalRecordID(String doctorID, String patientID)
      Retrieves a medical record ID for the specified doctor and patient. Searches through records in the repository to find the one that matches the doctor and patient IDs.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the ID of the doctor
      patientID - the ID of the patient
      Returns:
      the ID of the medical record matching the doctor and patient, or null if none found

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      public void recordAppointmentOutcome()
      Launches the appointment outcome recording interface for the doctor, allowing the doctor to record outcomes for completed appointments.
